content.html: JKR has never been a feminist or left wing as evidenced by Harry Potter. 1. Slavery is okay. The one character who tries to abolish slavery is mocked for doing so. 2. Women fall into 3 categories: angel in the house, femme fatale or spinster.
content.value:
JKR has never been a feminist or left wing as evidenced by Harry Potter.

1. Slavery is okay. The one character who tries to abolish slavery is mocked for doing so.

2. Women fall into 3 categories: angel in the house, femme fatale or spinster.
